Kalamazoo.Hackett Catholic Prep High School:
Hackett Catholic Prep High School is a private, Roman Catholic high school in Kalamazoo, Michigan. It is located in the Roman Catholic Diocese of Kalamazoo.


== History ==
Hackett Catholic Prep (formerly Hackett Catholic Central High School) was originally established in 1964 as Monsignor John R. Hackett High School in a joint agreement between the Diocese of Kalamazoo and the Society of Mary (Marianists).
